pages.text: Our centrifuge as well as the other tier 2 machines take much more energy than the tier 1 machines. To make up for the increased consumption, we will build a thermal generator.
First we need 4 iron ingots and 2 nickel ingots. The latter can be centrifuged from e.g. 18 raw copper. Now put the ingots into an iron alloy furnace or an alloy smelter.
While that's alloying, craft reinforced glass. After the alloying is done, put the invar ingots into the compressor.
The thermal generator runs on lava. A renewable lava source or easy access to a lava lake is recommended.
